attributes.action: SCRAP THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS FOREVER
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I AM CALLING ON YOU THE PRIME MINISTER GORDON BROWN AND YOUR MINISTERS TO SCRAP THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS FOREVER AND NEVER NEVER EVER BRING THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS BACK FAILURE TO DO SO WILL RESULT IN BUS COMPANIES CLOSING DOWN WITH THOUSANDS OF PEOPLE LOSING THEIR JOBS IN BUS COMPANIES LIKE WILTS AND DORSET, YOU THE PRIME MINISTER GORDON BROWN AND YOUR MINISTERS QUITE CLEARLY HAVE NOT THOUGHT THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS THROUGH PROPERLY AND IF YOU HAD YOU WOULD NOT BE IN THE MESS YOU PRIME MINISTER GORDON BROWN AND MINISTERS ARE IN OVER THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS, SO SCRAP THE NEW NATIONAL BUS PASS.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
